00527                 static bool mShuttingDown;
00528 
00540                 static void threadUpdate()
00541                 {
00542                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00543                         {
00544                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00545                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00546 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00547 #       ifndef LINUX
00548                                 Sleep(2);
00549 #       else
00550                                 sleep(2);
00551 #       endif
00552 #endif
00553                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00554                         }
00555                 }
00556 
00557 #endif
